text: int main ( ) { int temp ; int n , a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; int sum ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int j ; int i , k ; while ( n -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & j ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < j ; i ++ ) { for ( k = 0 ; k <= i ; k ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ k ] ) ; } } temp = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < j - 1 ; i ++ ) { k = 0 ; sum = a [ i ] [ k ] + a [ i + 1 ] [ k ] + a [ i + 1 ] [ k + 1 ] ; if ( temp < sum ) { temp = sum ; } } printf ( "%d  \n" , temp ) ; } return 0 ; }
